arbitraryKey.hint: This can be any text: passphrase, password, or custom string

create.backupHint: Please write down the following mnemonic words in order and keep them safe
create.backupSuccessDesc: You have successfully backed up your mnemonic. Please keep it safe.

collision.description: The mnemonic to import contains an existing wallet address
collision.title: Address Collision Detected
collision.warning: After confirmation, <bold>"{{name}}"</bold> will be deleted, and the new mnemonic wallet will contain all related addresses.

confirm.description: Please select the correct mnemonic in order
confirm.title: Confirm Mnemonic

form.agreementPrefix: I have read and agree to
form.agreementRequired: Please read and agree to the user agreement
form.passwordTipHint: Optional, to help you remember your password
form.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

create.mnemonicViewFirst: Please view and copy the mnemonic first
create.mnemonicWarning: Mnemonic is the only way to recover your wallet. It cannot be retrieved if lost. Do not screenshot or store online.
create.passwordDesc: Password is used to encrypt your wallet. Please remember it.

success.backupNote: You can backup mnemonic later in settings
success.securityReminderDesc: Please backup your mnemonic as soon as possible. It is the only way to recover your wallet. Lost mnemonic means lost assets.
success.title: Wallet Created!

create.title: Create Wallet
create.verifyDesc: Please enter the mnemonic words at the following positions

import.enterMnemonicDesc: Please enter your mnemonic in order
import.setPasswordDesc: Password is used to encrypt your wallet

keyType.arbitraryDesc: Any text as wallet secret (BioforestChain only)

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

form.checksumFailed: Mnemonic checksum failed, please check word order
form.invalidWord: "{{word}}" is not a valid BIP39 word
form.placeholder: Enter your mnemonic separated by spaces...
form.securityNotice: Please enter mnemonic in a secure environment. It will be used to recover all your on-chain assets.
form.validMnemonic: Mnemonic format is correct, BIP39 compliant

recover.passwordHint: Password is used to encrypt your wallet keys. Please remember it.
recover.passwordRule: At least 8 characters, no spaces allowed.
recover.title: Recover Wallet

securityWarning.message: Arbitrary keys may have lower security than standard mnemonics. Make sure your secret has sufficient entropy and is backed up safely.
securityWarning.title: Security Warning
